name: Free Solitaire - Simple, Vegas, and TIme Scoring
name_original: Free Solitaire - Simple, Vegas, and TIme Scoring
description:
If you love Solitaire, then you will love this free Solitaire game!

Solitaire by That's So Panda is considered to be the #1 class Solitaire game by some people and has been optimized for the Amazon Kindle devices. Staying true to the spirit of classic Solitaire and with crisp, clear, and easy to read cards, we've made sure that this version of Solitaire is simple to play. You can move cards with a single tap or you can drag the cards to their destination. We let you decide where you want to place your cards!

In addition to the easy game play, you can challenge yourself with Draw 1 or Draw 3 games and you can try out the Simple, Vegas, or Timed scoring modes. Solitaire by That's So Panda is probably the most fun version of Solitaire out there!
